attributes.action: No illegal migrant amnesty under Boris Johnson or any other future leader.
attributes.additional_details:
Boris Johnson calls for an illegal migrant amnesty as Mayor of London:

https://www.bbc.com/news/av/uk-politics-eu-referendum-36570523/eu-referendum-johnson-calls-for-illegal-immigrants-amnesty

Mr Johnson renews his call for an amnesty as Foreign Secretary:

https://www.bbc.com/news/av/uk-politics-43912048/croydon-views-on-johnson-s-call-for-immigration-amnesty

Center for Immigration Studies Report suggests amnesty increased illegal migration in America:

https://cis.org/New-INS-Report
attributes.background:
Boris Johnson previously expressed support for an amnesty for illegal migrants who have been in Britain for several years.

This would encourage more illegal migration and break many MPs' manifesto commitments to reduce net migration. Neither Mr Johnson nor any other future leader should pass one.
